channel.title: The Brewhouse Show
channel.description: The Brewhouse Show is about designing and developing products people love.
channel.itunes:author: Brewhouse Software, Inc.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Designing and developing products people love.
channel.itunes:summary: The Brewhouse Show is about designing and developing products people love.

item.title: Episode 20: The Big Dream
item.description:
One of the easiest mistakes to make as a company is to lose sight of where you’re headed. When your team has their heads down, hammering away at their keyboards, it’s important to have a destination to look towards to keep everything else in perspective. This week, Kalv and Pat talk about the process Brewhouse is taking to establishing a Big Dream for the next 3–5 years, and what we hope that Big Dream will do for us as we work day to day crafting products people love.

Show Notes

  • Pat’s Q1 review of his 2016 goals
  • On hiring HabitStack
  • HabitStack
  • Scott Ward
  • The curse of the last word by Jason Fried
  • Thingthing
  • Any.do
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 20: The Big Dream

item.title: Episode 19: Pricing service work
item.description:
Brewhouse bills clients based on weekly iterations. However, there is an ongoing discussion about whether pricing your work based on time is the most effective approach. This week, Kalv and Pat chat about pricing design and development for client services.

Show Notes

  • Yak and Yeti Bistro
  • Why we are getting rid of our hourly rate by Jon Lax
  • Tiered Value Based Pricing by David Gillis
  • Value Pricing by Dan Mall
  • Pricing Design by Dan Mall
  • Basecamp 3
  • Imprint
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 19: Pricing service work

item.title: Episode 18: A chat about chatbots
item.description:
Conversational UIs are all the rage these days. With the rise in access to mobile devices in developing countries, chat services and bots are quickly becoming critical for economic development. How do we take advantage of this changing paradigm here in North America? Kalv and Pat talk about their experience with conversational UIs and discuss the problems still to be solved in this emerging space.

Show Notes

  • Wit.ai Bot Engine
  • Amazon Echo
  • Messenger Platform Beta
  • Amazon Echo Is Magical. It’s Also Turning My Kid Into an Asshole.
  • Contour
  • A conversation about conversations
  • Why conversational commerce may be our best chance to re-imagine the web
  • Stephanie Rieger
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 18: A chat about chatbots

item.title: Episode 17: Interview w/ Joe Stump, cofounder of Sprintly, SimpleGeo, and attachments.me
item.description:
This week, Kalv and Pat are joined by technical leader and serial entrepreneur, Joe Stump. As the founder of Sprint.ly, SimpleGeo, and Attachments.me, Joe has gained a tremendous amount of knowledge and wisdom which he graciously shared with our listeners during a live Blab.im chat.

Show Notes

  • The Other Joe Stump
  • Sprint.ly
  • Daniel Burka
  • eNotes
  • TLS
  • Design is how it works
  • Twitter Bot Makes Death Threat
  • Snapchat Lenses
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.
